alert.note: Alert for Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 05 at 9:46AM EDT until April 05 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for Poor Drainage Areas for... Berrien County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 1245 PM EDT. * At 945 AM EDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain and street flooding in Saint Joseph Michigan due to thunderstorms. Overflowing poor drainage areas will result in minor flooding. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Benton Harbor, St. Joseph, Fair Plain, Benton Heights, Bridgman, New Buffalo, Watervliet, Three Oaks, Coloma, Stevensville, Shorewood-Tower Hill, Paw Paw Lake, Shorewood-Tower Hills-Harbert, Lake Michigan Beach, Sodus, Riverside, Baroda, Shoreham, Galien and Michiana Shores.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
